name: Cute Ghost Game
description:
Players are a scared ghost, and need to collect potions in order gain their confidence and mature finally as a scary ghost themselves. The other ghosts are haunting you though, so be sure to avoid their intimidating ghost balls.

Made as part of the Berlin 2021 October Mini Game jam - 8 hours to build a game, offering a chance to learn new skills, work with different people and have lots of fun!
